nodes.text: The Belugans were a crystalline-aquatic species native to the planet Quarzite.

A famous member of these species, Otua Blank, was the corpulent, tyrannical dictator of the planet during the Clone Wars. They disliked the Kage, as they had a raging war against them, and to them, the Kage were considered marauders. The species did show some martial arts, as Major Rigosso was seen giving a butterfly kick to an incoming Kage Warrior.
